title: T3 Turkey Red ThomasSOLDPSA 1MK but VERY NICE

posts.post_title: T3 Turkey Red ThomasSOLDPSA 1MK but VERY NICE
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a T3 Turkey Red Ira Thomas in his iconic, period catchers pose. This one is graded by PSA a 1MK. It has a tiny pin hole top center that is not obvious but can be seen when holding it up to the light. On the clean ad back is a tiny blue stamp the says No. 123. The corners are touched but square. The card is crease free. It is a 1 due to the very tiny pinhole and an mk due to the very small stamp on the back which can be seen in the scan. The image is crystal clear 
SOLDplus 9.99 shipping with tracking net
Price Drop. Also on ebay now
